meta.name: Generate AI Meeting Summaries and Tasks from Fathom Recordings to Dart

name: Fathom Meeting Summary Generator to Dart Docs and task

parameters.content:
## Meeting Summary Generator (Fathom → Dart)  
Automatically generate a meeting summary from your meetings through Fathom, save it to a Dart document, and create a review task with the Fathom link attached.  

### Who’s It For  
- Teams or individuals needing automatic meeting notes  
- Project managers tracking reviews and actions  
- Users of Fathom + Dart for streamlined documentation  

### How to Set Up  
- Connect your Dart account (workspace + folder access)  
- Add your PROD webhook link in the webhook node to Fathom API settings ([Docs](https://developers.fathom.ai/webhooks))  
- Replace dummy Folder ID and Dartboard ID with your targets  
- Choose your preferred AI model for summaries  

### Customizing the Workflow  
- Edit the AI prompt to adjust tone or style  
- Add or change summary sections (e.g., Key takeaways, Action Items, Next Items)

## 1. Workflow launch through Fathom webhook trigger
Triggered by an online meeting completion connected to Fathom

**Summary categorization**
AI generates summary from meeting transcript with these categories in mind:
- Key takeaways
- Topics covered
- Next items 
- Action items


**Model selection**
Test and use any AI chat model. (Results could vary by model quality)

## 2. Parsing the AI output
Parse output into a usable format for the next nodes.

### JSON formatting
- **Parse:** AI output into structured JSON  
- **Extract:** Key takeaways, Topics covered, Next items, Action items
- **Ensure:** Clean, consistent, taggable data

## 3. Retrieve target folder
Select the Folder in your workspace where new meeting documents will be created.

### Folder targeting
- Locate your Folder ID in the workspace  
- Replace the placeholder ID in this node
- Confirms all generated documents route to the correct folder

## 4. Create new document
This step creates a new document in your selected folder containing the generated meeting summary.

### Document creation includes
- Document title
- Key takeaways
- Topics covered
- Next items
- Action items

## 5. Retrieve target dartboard
Select the Dartboard in your workspace where new tasks will be created.

### Dartboard targeting
- Locate your Dartboard ID in the workspace  
- Replace the placeholder ID in this node
- Confirms all generated tasks route to the correct board

## 6. Create a review task in Dart  
Create a task in Dart to review the summary of your recent online meeting through your newly linked document.  

### Task creation includes  
- **CTA to view meeting summary** + linked newly generated document  
- **CTA to view Fathom meeting recording** + Fathom recording link  

### Outcome  
A review task is automatically generated in Dart, connecting both your meeting summary and Fathom recording for seamless follow-up.

transcript.text: We'll click that button so that Fathom can join this meeting now.
Here is where the magic happens.
You don't have to click a single button or take a single note.
Fathom will capture all of the important moments and action items, and then we'll deliver them to your inbox within 30 seconds of the meeting ending.
You don't have to click a thing.
But say that a really special moment on the call does happen that you know you want to go back and rewatch.
There's a highlight button on that Fathom panel.
Go ahead and click that, and you'll see it highlighted on the call recording page, which I'm also going to show you in a minute.
Anytime you want Fathom to stop recording, there's an end button on that Fathom panel.
You can click that, and Fathom will stop recording.
Or, when all participants leave the meeting, Fathom will also stop recording.
Once the call is done being recorded, that can...
The control panel will flip to a new screen and will have a big blue button that says View, Recording, and Summary.
When you click that button, it will take you to the call recording page.
All right, now go ahead, end this meeting, and then click that View, Recording, and Summary button, and I'll see you over on the call recording page.

default_summary.markdown_formatted:
## Meeting Purpose

[Demo Fathom's core features and workflow.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=7.0)

## Key Takeaways

  - [Fathom auto-records and delivers a summary/recording within 30 seconds of a call ending.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=7.0)
  - [The highlight button on the Fathom panel lets users mark key moments for easy review on the recording page.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=25.0)
  - [Recording stops automatically when all participants leave or can be manually stopped via the "End" button on the panel.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=42.0)
  - [A "View Recording & Summary" button appears post-call, linking directly to the recording page.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=57.0)

## Topics

### Fathom's Core Workflow

  - [**Automated Capture:** Fathom joins meetings automatically upon activation, eliminating manual note-taking.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=7.0)
  - [**Post-Call Delivery:** A summary and recording are sent to the user's inbox within 30 seconds of the call ending.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=7.0)
  - [**Manual Highlights:** The Fathom panel's highlight button lets users mark specific moments for later review on the recording page.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=25.0)
  - [**Recording Controls:**](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=42.0)
      - [**Auto-Stop:** When all participants leave.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=42.0)
      - [**Manual Stop:** Via the "End" button on the Fathom panel.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=42.0)
  - [**Accessing Results:** After a call, the panel shows a "View Recording & Summary" button that links to the recording page.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=57.0)

## Next Steps

  - [**Participant:** End the meeting.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=71.0)
  - [**Participant:** Click the "View Recording & Summary" button to access the recording page.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=71.0)
  - [**Emmily Bowman:** Meet the participant on the recording page to continue the demo.](https://fathom.video/share/3fBxVcqH5-h1Jvas1SikLvJVWxyfC67E?tab=summary&timestamp=71.0)
